There is a group of people in Canada who are trying to replace native born Canadians with immigrants who agree with their political views

The 15-minute city is designed to track and limit the movement of Canadians to their immediate neighbourhood
A man’s dating success is determined entirely by his physical attractiveness and so is determined at birth
Bill Gates used the COVID-19 pandemic to push a vaccine with a microchip capable of tracking people

The Holocaust has been exaggerated
